instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-02020: What is 820-02020? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.A2338: What is A2338? A2338 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years Late 2020 M1, Mid 2022 M2 with EMC 8162, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-02020, 820-02773..

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-02020</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A no backlight until after login, and non functional touchbar
threads.message:
Hi all.
An interesting one.
We have an <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2338</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>, running Monteray, that has no back light from the moment you turn it on, until you have logged in with your password, when it will turn on, and stay on.
i.e. the Apple logo doesn't have a back light at all, or the login screen.

We have tried two other screens, all behave in the same manner.


The other issue, that may be related, is the touchbar will illuminate when you log in, but it does not respond to input.

Zero signs of liquid ingress or physical damage.

Any help or advice appreciated.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-02020</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A no backlight until after login, and non functional touchbar
threads.message:
Tried PRAM reset?
How the fault appeared?
